department: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of  Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)
short_summary: Ship Drydock and Repair Work for Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) Pierre Radisson
description: The contractor will perform ship repair work, including dry docking, on the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) Pierre Radisson.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
=====================================

**Title**
--------

*   F3065-240003 - CCGS Pierre Radisson - Drydock Spring 2024 - RFP
*   F3065-240003 - Cale sèche du navire NGCC Pierre Radisson - printemps 2024 - DDP

**Reference Information**
-----------------------

*   Reference Number: WS4430566750-Doc4430587012
*   Amendment Number: 3
*   Solicitation Number: WS4430566750

**Solicitation Details**
----------------------

*   Publication Date: March 6, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: March 28, 2024 (14:00:00)
*   Amendment Date: March 21, 2024
*   Expected Contract Start Date: None
*   Expected Contract End Date: June 1, 2025
*   Tender Status: Expired

**Contract Description**
---------------------

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing a bid solicitation on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) for the acquisition of ship repair work, including dry docking, for the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) Pierre Radisson, located in Quebec, QC.

**Contract Details**
-------------------

*   Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
*   Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding (COB)
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
*   Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Regions of Opportunity: Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region)
*   Regions of Delivery: Quebec

**Contact Information**
-------------------

*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
    *   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
    *   City: Gatineau
    *   Province: Quebec
    *   Postal Code: K1A 0S5
    *   Country: Canada
*   End User: Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)
    *   Address: 200 Kent St. Station 13E228
    *   City: Ottawa
    *   Province: Ontario
    *   Postal Code: K1A 0E6
    *   Country: Canada

**Access the Solicitation**
------------------------
